name: Character Design for Comics and Games
description: Create unique and engaging character designs for creative projects.

input_config.prompt: Generate comic book character design based on the following description: {{characters_personality}} , {{characters_backstory}} , {{characters_role}} , {{characters_style}} , {{background}},

background.title: Describe the background
background.description: Where do they come from? What experiences shaped them?

ui_metadata.value: Alice grew up in a small town surrounded by nature. She loved spending time outdoors and exploring the woods near her home.

characters_role.title: Describes character's role (hero, villain, etc.).
characters_role.description: Is this a valiant hero, a cunning villain, or a quirky sidekick?  pen_spark

ui_metadata.value: Role: Alice is a main character in a story about a group of friends who go on an adventure.

characters_style.title: Prompts for style, clothing, and body type
characters_style.description: Do you envision a classic comic book aesthetic, a hyper-realistic game character, or something entirely different?

ui_metadata.value: Style: Storybook or Fantasy with soft, dreamlike qualities. Color palette: Soft greens, blues, and yellows to evoke nature, with accents of red for her hair. Clothing: Flowing dresses or tunics that allow for movement, with hints of floral patterns or natural textures.

characters_backstory.title: Describes the character's backstory
characters_backstory.description: Where they're from and their upbringing?  Events that set them on their current path.

ui_metadata.value: Backstory: Alice is a talented artist who loves to paint and draw. She is also a skilled musician and loves to play the piano.

characters_personality.title: Describes the character's personality
characters_personality.description: Are they courageous and optimistic, or brooding and cynical?

ui_metadata.value: Character: Alice, Description: Kind, compassionate, dreamy artist with long red hair and green eyes
